name: geocode
title: Geocode
description: Tool to search OSM data by name and address and to generate synthetic addresses of OSM points (reverse geocoding). It has also limited capability to search features by their type (pubs, hotels, churches, etc)
author: herostwist

commands.name: search-for-location-by-name-or-address
commands.title: Search for location by name or address
commands.description: Search OSM data by name and address

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
